name: Smith Press
how_to_perform:
1. Hold a Smith machine bar with your hands shoulder-width apart, palms facing away from you.

2. Place your feet flat on the ground, directly under the bar.

3. Lower yourself down by bending at the elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the ground and your chest almost touches the bar.

4. Pause briefly at the bottom of the movement.

5. Press upwards by extending your arms fully, squeezing your chest muscles as you reach the top of the movement.

6. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Smith press is a machine-based upper body exercise that primarily works the chest and shoulders.
